participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, Lila enjoys the quieter moments in life and has a passion for the arts.
participant_1.background: I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach while on vacation. I used to work as an actress. I also dance and sing. My favorite food is sushi. I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Literal and straightforward, Jake has a unique perspective on life and enjoys physical challenges.
participant_2.background: I remember my dad taking me fishing in the pond on his property. I take everything literally. I am into parkour because it is a great way to stay in shape and it is also a lot of fun. I have a sleeve of tattoos. I go to the desert a lot, but I'm not as happy with my weight as I could be.

content.text: Hey! I like to read books while on vacation too. What's your favorite book?
Twilight, I love the whole series. I like how the characters all have their own unique personalities and how the story develops. What about you?
I like the whole series too! It's so romantic and suspenseful. I used to work as an actress and it was so much fun! What did you used to do for work?
I was a parkour instructor, it was really fun and a great way to stay in shape. I also have a sleeve of tattoos.
Oh that's really cool! I like tattoos, I have been thinking about getting one but I haven't decided what I want yet. I really enjoy my quiet life and green tea.
I take everything literally, so sometimes people think I'm being sarcastic but I'm really not. I like going to the desert a lot, but I'm not as happy with my weight as I could be.

I know what you mean, I'm not always good at expressing my emotions either. I also enjoy going to the desert, it's so peaceful and beautiful. I'm sure you'll get to your goal weight, just keep working hard
